content.query:
Drop TABLE [scorecard].[PostSecondary];
GO


select 	distinct a.[Cohort Year],
    a.[School Code],
    a.[School Name],
    b.[District Code],
    b.[District Name],
    a.[Student Group Type],
    a.[Student Group Category],
    a.[Student Group],
    a.[PS Enroll Level],
    a.[Pct] as [Pct School],
    a.[Redacted Pct],
    a.[Cohort Type],
	b.[Pct] as [Pct District]

--Into [scorecard].[PostSecondary]

from [transform].[PostSecondarySchool] a
Inner join [transform].[PostSecondaryDistrict] b on a.[District Code] = b.[District Code] and a.[Cohort Year] = b.[Cohort Year] and a.[Student Group] = b.[Student Group] and a.[PS Enroll Level] = b.[PS Enroll Level] and a.[Cohort Type] = b.[Cohort Type] 
		and a.[Redacted Pct] = b.[Redacted Pct]


select top 100 *
from [scorecard].[PostSecondary]
